meanings.definition: A change in form or nature
meanings.sent1: The metamorphisms of the caterpillar into a butterfly is a beautiful transformation.
meanings.sent2: The metamorphisms of the tadpole into a frog is a common process in nature.
meanings.sent3: The metamorphisms of the pumpkin into a carriage in the fairy tale was quite magical.
meanings.sent4: The metamorphisms of the city skyline at sunset is like a painting coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The metamorphisms of the chrysalis cracking open to reveal a butterfly is a breathtaking sight.

meanings.sent1: The metamorphisms of the seed into a plant is a fascinating process to observe.
meanings.sent2: The metamorphisms of a caterpillar into a butterfly involves various stages.
meanings.sent3: The metamorphisms of a pumpkin into a carriage in the story happened overnight!
meanings.sent4: The metamorphisms of a caterpillar spinning a cocoon is like nature's magic trick.
meanings.sent5: The metamorphisms of a tadpole growing legs and losing its tail is a remarkable change.

meanings.definition: A marked change in appearance or character
meanings.sent1: The metamorphisms of the actor on stage with different costumes was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The metamorphisms of the landscape after the snowfall was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The metamorphisms of the cat into a lion in the play was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The metamorphisms of the old building into a modern skyscraper was a striking change.
meanings.sent5: The metamorphisms of the chameleon changing colors to blend in is a remarkable adaptation.
